com.guardtime.ksi.unisignature

Interface KSISignatureFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryKsiSignatureFactory

    public interface KSISignatureFactory
    Interface for creating keyless signatures. Implementation of this class can be used to get instance of KSISignature.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KSISignature createSignature(InputStream input)
      Creates keyless uni-signature from input stream.
      KSISignature createSignature(List<AggregationHashChain> aggregationHashChains, CalendarHashChain calendarHashChain, CalendarAuthenticationRecord authenticationRecord, PublicationRecord publicationRecord, RFC3161Record rfc3161Record)
      Creates keyless uni-signature from given elements.
      KSISignature createSignature(TLVElement element, DataHash originalInputHash)
      Creates keyless uni-signature from input TLV element.

    • Method Detail

      • createSignature

        KSISignature createSignature(InputStream input)
                      throws KSIException
        Creates keyless uni-signature from input stream.
        Parameters:
        input - input stream to be used to createSignature data
        Returns:
        instance of KSISignature
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g input data is invalid)

      • createSignature

        KSISignature createSignature(TLVElement element,
                             DataHash originalInputHash)
                      throws KSIException
        Creates keyless uni-signature from input TLV element.
        Parameters:
        element - instance of TLVElement. not null
        originalInputHash - - original input hash. It is used to verify signature if it is present.
        Returns:
        instance of KSISignature
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g input data is invalid)

      • createSignature

        KSISignature createSignature(List<AggregationHashChain> aggregationHashChains,
                             CalendarHashChain calendarHashChain,
                             CalendarAuthenticationRecord authenticationRecord,
                             PublicationRecord publicationRecord,
                             RFC3161Record rfc3161Record)
                      throws KSIException
        Creates keyless uni-signature from given elements.
        Parameters:
        aggregationHashChains - list of aggregation hash chain element. not null
        calendarHashChain - calendar hash chain element. not null.
        authenticationRecord - calendar hash chain authentication element.
        publicationRecord - signature publication record.
        rfc3161Record - signature RFC3161 record
        Returns:
        instance of KSISignature
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g input data is invalid)
